'''Soba Noodles''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Soba Noodles is obtainable from [[Kiminami Anna]] at [[Kiminami Restaurant]] for 1,250 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Soba Noodles restores '''8'''/'''9'''/'''10'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''210'''/'''260'''/'''300''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
